ticket.title: Add --password option to model generator
ticket.original-body:
@@@ bash rails generate model user --password email:string name:string @@@
I think this falls in line with the other available options on the model generator and will help new users get up and running with the [new password functionality](https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activemodel/lib/active_model/secure_password.rb). I can already see I'd rather do this than have to lookup the name of the magic column or define a second migration for it after the fact.
